title: Focus- Live at the Rainbow 1973-5-5 with Bonus (DVD)
description:
Focus- Live at the Rainbow 1973-5-5 with Bonus (DVD)
Focus- Live at the Rainbow with Bonus (DVD)
Filmed at the Rainbow Theatre in London, UK
May 5 1973
Pro-shot

Setlist:

01- Intro
02 - Focus II 
03 - Hocus Pocus 
04 - Focus III 
05 - Answers? Questions! Questions? Answers! 
06 - Eruption
07 - Jan Akkerman Lute Solo ("Britannia" by John Dowland) 
08 - Sylvia 
09 - Hocus Pocus (Reprise) 

Bonus footage (Pro-Shot):

10- Hocus Pocus (Live at PinkPop Festival, 1972)
11- Hamburgo concerto excerpt (Live Rock Concert, 1974)
12- House of the King (Dutch TV Live, 1990)
13- Interview (Dutch TV, 1990)

Reunion concert: Live at Goud van Oud, April 20th 1990, Americahal, Apeldoorn, Netherlands 
14- House of the King
15- Tommy 
16- Sylvia 

Band: Thijs van Leer: keyboards, flute, vocals 
Jan Akkerman: guitars, lute 
Bert Ruiter: bass guitar 
Pierre van der Linden: drums


Total time: 69 min (44 min from Live at the Rainbow + 25 min Bonus footage) 
Enjoy!!
